game-tiles.title: Hello World!
game-tiles.description: A new developer makes a hello world application that so happens to say a bit more tham just hello.

game-tiles.title: Secret Agent Mystery
game-tiles.description: An interactive fiction based on a James Bond short story.

game-tiles.title: Would You Rather
game-tiles.description: A game of unbelievable scenarios that just keeps unwinding and unraveling into random, wild, and weird occurrences.
